channel.description: Recent content in Muses - Digital Musical Instruments on Muses

item.title: Contributors
item.description: Muses is under active development by Benedict R. Gaster and Nathan Renney, along with contrabutions from Carinna Parraman and others.

item.title: Muses - Digital Musical Instruments
item.description: Muses is an umbrella project for work being done in the Physical Computing Group at University of West of England (UWE). Our particular focus is applying programming language theory and practice, physical computing, networking, and musicial theory to design and implementation of Digitial Musical Instruments (DMI).

item.title: Projects
item.description: SVG Interfaces Muses Audio Formalizing Faust in terms of Arrows Modeling Drum Skins with FDTD
